column4: headed by HE General Soe Thon
column6: led an operation to crack down on the Miami Amusement Club on Street 360 in Boeung Keng Kang I
column7: Khan Chamkar Mon At 2:00 am on April 11
column9: over drug use.------The club has already been visited by authorities three times
column11: but quickly reopened.------More than 40 people were detained
column13: but the authorities have not yet released an official statement.------The detained young men and women were taken to the Phnom Penh police station for questioning.------Updates to follow. ------https://tvfb.news/article/20150
